title: Retardedly onesided all the fucking time.
body: This will prob be taken down, but this game has got SO SO SOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO one sided in EVERY game you play, there is no way to come back anymore when someone gets fed, and they will NEVER change that, you always see the same champs in every game becuse they are too broken, when you win a game its by a 100% complete landslide, you DOMINATE the other team ALWAYS and alot of people are going to downvote this because they are always lucky in that aspect, no matter how well you play, someone on your team will always fuck up and ruin it and then its over. Im getting so fed up of the bull shit and seeing 0 changes to the game to "blance" it.

replies.body:
Maybe this should get taken down, but only because you are wrong in every single point you make.

1. If the game is one sided for you, and you can't bring a game back once someone gets fed, then you're just bad.

That's it really. The only champions that are OP once people gets snowballing are Anivia, Riven, Darius, Nasus. If you can't beat other champions than that when they get fed... it's a lack of skill by you or your team. Because every champion has their weaknesses, even though some are unbalanced. Even Yi can be easily killed.

I have had heaps of close games these days, and the only games that are one sided is when I'm playing Draven.{{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}}
This is only true for ARAM lmao
